alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 9:33PM CST until January 07 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Light snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to half an inch. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake, Central St. Louis and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area and the Fond du Lac Band. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
